title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Overview of ship production systems; Information for shipbuilding production; Product standardization and work simplification; Product work breakdown and integrated zone engineering; Linear programming concepts; Network analysis; Scheduling and resource allocation; DBMS in production planning and control.
